name: Illhveli, Kembingur
description: The Kembingur is a gargantuan aquatic creature with significant physical power and a menacing presence. It has a massive body well-suited for melee combat, and its skin is covered with natural armor.
memorable: Its ability to smell blood from miles away and its 'Blood Frenzy' that gives it advantage against weakened foes makes it notably deadly.
goals: The Kembingur typically seeks to hunt and ambush its prey in aquatic environments.
relations: It may be found alongside or clashing with other aquatic predators.
environment: Usually found in oceans or large bodies of water.
strengths: Exceptional melee combat abilities enhanced by 'Blood Frenzy' and high resilience due to its large hit point pool.
weaknesses: Lower Intelligence limits its tactical options compared to more cunning foes.
attacks: The Kembingur uses a powerful bite attack and a sweeping tail strike against its opponents.
most_powerful_ability: Blood Scent allows it to track injured creatures from up to 5 miles away.
senses: Possesses keen senses with a passive Perception of 20.
skills: Skilled in Athletics and Perception, making it adept at navigating its environment and detecting threats.
additional_information: Can hold its breath for an hour, allowing it to remain submerged.
Deals double damage to objects and structures as a siege monster.
Creates difficult terrain with its Churn Water ability.
test_queries: gargantuan aquatic predator with chaotic abilities
creature that senses blood in water
massive monster with blood frenzy attack
brutal water beast with difficult terrain ability
chaotic evil monster in large bodies of water
